page.title: 05FARMS
page.content: There are 18 farms altogether in our area.A typical larger farm is Rokeby Grange,(Map reference 070,140) The farmer is Mr.B.Nicols.He farms 460 acres,150 acres of wheat,80 acres of barley,20 acres of peas and 60 acres of oil seed rape. His animals are sheep and beef cattle and altogether they have 800 head.Mr.Nicols thinks his farm was built near 1740.He has 5 cars,5 tractors,balers and one combine-harvester,mobile corn driers and seed drills. A smaller farm in our area is Cross Lanes,(Map reference 050,139)It has 30 acres of land,mostly crops,15 acres of wheat and 58 beef cattle and a few milk cows.They have 1 tractor and trailer and a small car.The{farm}is situated by the A66.In the winter they have lots of snow which sometimes blocks the roads.
